AGENT.description: Agent Execution bounded context - runner, message history, conversation orchestration

CTX.description: Context Management bounded context - token tracking, compaction, caching, project context

CLI.description: CLI Interface bounded context - command parsing, config loading, provider selection

WEB.description: Web search and content fetching tools

NAPI.description: NAPI-RS native bindings for codelet CLI commands

TOOL.description: Tool facade implementations for provider-specific tool interfaces
